item.title: Making Sense of Rollups
item.description: First of all, let’s give you a banger to listen along this wild ride that I had while going deep and deep in this amazing rabbit hole of Rollups.

item.title: Tendermint
item.description: Tendermint is the consenus protocol used by Cosmos to reach consensus in a distributed system.

item.title: Uncovering Celestia
item.description: Privileged. A Chosen Few. Blessed With our time in Hell. Another song today would be Hourglass from Lamb of God.
